\newline

sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
Find the mean proportion of 24.5 and 0.5 
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 1, "step_txt": "$$\text{ The mean proportion of $\input[s1v1]{}$ and 0.5 is}$$ \[\sqrt{24.5 \times 0.5 }\]."}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 1, "step_txt": "\[
	= \sqrt{\frac{\input[s2v1]{} \times 5.0 }{100}}\]"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 1, "step_txt": "\[=\frac{\input[s3v1]{} }{10} = 3.5\]"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 1, "step_txt": "Since, 
\[
	\input[s4v1]{} \times 5.0 = 1225 = 35 ^2
\]
\newline"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [24.5], "text": "$$\text{Using the formula for mean proportion which is $\sqrt{a\times b}$, where $a$ and $b$ are numbers, we get the expression $\sqrt{24.5 \times 0.5 }$}$$"}, {"data": [245.0], "text": "$$\text{We can simplify the product of the two numbers by dividing both the numbers by 100, which can be written as}$$ \[\sqrt{\frac{245.0 \times 5.0 }{100}}\]."}, {"data": [35], "text": "$$\text{Taking square root and simplifing we get}$$\[=\frac{35 }{10} = 3.5\]"}, {"data": [245.0], "text": "$$\text{Further simplification will get us to the required result 35.}$$"}]
